system.availability: A Cruder Version of the Chem Gland, consists of ten doses of four separate substances chosen at implantation. As a Half Action one is injected and applied instantly. These can be triggered manually or remotely by someone else. If the user suffers a Critical Hit, the character must make a Toughness Test or suffer 2d10 damage ignoring armour as the injector malfunctions.
system.cost:
Commonly chosen drugs are Frenzon, Slaught, Stimm, and De-Tox
Cost does not include Drug Doses which must be acquired seperately.
